document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/H21/Final proposal.Integrating Gender into CC POlicies and Programmes in Bhutan.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
1. Awareness raised and knowledge shared with government delegates, civil society, and international organizations about the centrality of gender equality to effective policy and programmatic implementation
2. Capacity built at all levels to design and implement gender-responsive climate change policies, strategies and programmes in Africa and Asia and the Pacific.

project_title: Gender responsive CC policies, strategies and programmes
